General.Name: Jiangsu Sanfangxiang Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Sanfame Polyester Material Co.,Ltd. engages in the production and sale of bottle-grade polyester chips and PTA in China. It offers polyester fibers, including polyester staple fibers and polyester filaments for use in textile industry; bottle-grade polyester chips that are used in soft drinks, dairy products, edible oils, condiments, alcohol, daily chemicals, electronic products, medical and pharmaceutical fields; and polyester films for use in packaging, printing, optoelectronics, and other applications. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Jiangyin, China.

0.Name: Ms. Hongxia  Yu
0.Title: CFO & Sec. of the Board of Directors
